overview:
Harish began his post MBA career as a Strategy Consultant at IBM. While he did enjoy working with companies who were looking at expanding into new markets, he soon realized that consulting meant little when you are still wet behind the ears.

He then went into the best profession in the world - Sales! Having started this leg of his career working for the best salesman ever, he slowly realized that this is the profession which thrilled him the most.

He now is working with few of the smartest entrepreneurs in the valley, selling ads!
